title: Reduce verbosity in vc when Node is syncing

labels.name: scope-testnet-debugging
labels.description: Issues uncovered through running a node on a public testnet.

body:
Along those lines, changing Lodestar so it does not worry the user with error messages while consensus client is still syncing would be excellent.

```
consensus_1             | Jul-02 08:55:08.118 [API]             error: Req req-3 getProposerDuties error message=Node is syncing, headSlot 7040 currentSlot 726875
consensus_1             | Error: Node is syncing, headSlot 7040 currentSlot 726875
consensus_1             |     at notWhileSyncing (/usr/app/node_modules/@chainsafe/lodestar/src/api/impl/validator/index.ts:124:17)
consensus_1             |     at Object.getProposerDuties (/usr/app/node_modules/@chainsafe/lodestar/src/api/impl/validator/index.ts:182:7)
consensus_1             |     at Object.handler (/usr/app/node_modules/@chainsafe/lodestar-api/src/server/utils/server.ts:70:29)
consensus_1             |     at preHandlerCallback (/usr/app/node_modules/fastify/lib/handleRequest.js:124:28)
consensus_1             |     at preValidationCallback (/usr/app/node_modules/fastify/lib/handleRequest.js:107:5)
consensus_1             |     at handler (/usr/app/node_modules/fastify/lib/handleRequest.js:70:7)
consensus_1             |     at handleRequest (/usr/app/node_modules/fastify/lib/handleRequest.js:18:5)
consensus_1             |     at runPreParsing (/usr/app/node_modules/fastify/lib/route.js:422:5)
consensus_1             |     at next (/usr/app/node_modules/fastify/lib/hooks.js:158:7)
consensus_1             |     at handleResolve (/usr/app/node_modules/fastify/lib/hooks.js:175:5)
```

_Originally posted by @yorickdowne in https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/issues/1492#issuecomment-872977281_

To be clear, these error messages are from the consensus client (beacon), not the validator client.

The validator client shows similar error messages. Reducing verbosity in both would be awesome.

From the vc:

```
validator_1             | Jul-02 12:04:13.148 []                error: Error on pollBeaconProposers message=Error on getProposerDuties - Service Unavailable: Node is syncing, headSlot 52544 currentSlot 727821
validator_1             | Error: Error on getProposerDuties - Service Unavailable: Node is syncing, headSlot 52544 currentSlot 727821
validator_1             |     at HttpClient.request (/usr/app/node_modules/@chainsafe/lodestar-api/src/client/utils/httpClient.ts:85:15)
validator_1             |     at runMicrotasks (<anonymous>)
validator_1             |     at processTicksAndRejections (node:internal/process/task_queues:96:5)
validator_1             |     at HttpClient.json (/usr/app/node_modules/@chainsafe/lodestar-api/src/client/utils/httpClient.ts:57:12)
validator_1             |     at Object.request [as getProposerDuties] (/usr/app/node_modules/@chainsafe/lodestar-api/src/client/utils/client.ts:71:19)
validator_1             |     at BlockDutiesService.pollBeaconProposers (/usr/app/node_modules/@chainsafe/lodestar-validator/src/services/blockDuties.ts:141:28)
validator_1             |     at BlockDutiesService.pollBeaconProposersAndNotify (/usr/app/node_modules/@chainsafe/lodestar-validator/src/services/blockDuties.ts:115:5)
validator_1             |     at /usr/app/node_modules/@chainsafe/lodestar-validator/src/services/blockDuties.ts:74:7
validator_1             |     at Clock.runAtMostEvery (/usr/app/node_modules/@chainsafe/lodestar-validator/src/util/clock.ts:68:7)
```

an example response from https://ethereum.github.io/eth2.0-APIs/#/Validator/produceBlockV2
```
{
  "code": 503,
  "message": "Beacon node is currently syncing and not serving request on that endpoint"
}
```
